com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client
Class Model<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.gwtmvc.client.Model<T>
Type Parameters:
T - data type
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelForView<T>
public abstract class Model<T>
extends Object
implements ModelForView<T>

Represent a data (or a collection of data) on the client side. USAGE: Your model should have his own methods to load his datas by a RPC call, and then call update method.

isInitialised

public boolean isInitialised()
Give wether the controller has been initialised or not.
The controller is initialised when it handle an event, or when the method doInitIfNecessary is called.

Returns:
true if it had been initialised
